description: Looking for great hotels or restaurants on the go?  TripAdvisor has the world’s most trusted travel advice, and now you can get it on your Palm.  For locations all over the world, you can: Read hotel reviews and check rates - Find restaurants near you - Find things to do, at home or on the go - Share your experience.  Write reviews from your phone - Get phone numbers, addresses and directions when you need them most.   With more than 30 million reviews, TripAdvisor is the world’s largest travel community.  Millions of fellow travelers have shared their candid reviews of hotels, restaurants, attractions, and more. Now you can add your travel reviews from your phone and help travelers around the world plan and have a great trip.
